text: Han Song-ryol (, born 17 June 1954) is a Vice Foreign Minister at North Korea's Ministry of Foreign Affairs.Shifts in North Korea’s Foreign Ministry and Nuclear Communications. 38 North, 11 October 2016. Previously, he served as the deputy chief of North Korea's mission to the United Nations from 2002 to 2006. In February 2015, he was appointed as director-general of the U.S. affairs department at North Korea's Foreign Ministry. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:1954 births Category:North Korean diplomats Category:Anti-Americanism Category:Foreign ministers of North Korea
title: Han Song-ryol
